nodes.documentation:
@title LibRelayer provides two distinct features for relayers. 
 * First, Relayers can opt into or out of the Hydro liquidity incentive system.
 * Second, a relayer can register a delegate address.
Delegates can send matching requests on behalf of relayers.
The delegate scheme allows additional possibilities for smart contract interaction.
on behalf of the relayer.
nodes.name: LibRelayer

nodes.documentation: Approve an address to match orders on behalf of msg.sender
nodes.name: approveDelegate

nodes.documentation: @return true if msg.sender is allowed to match orders which belong to relayer
nodes.name: canMatchOrdersFrom

nodes.documentation:
Exit the Hydro incentive system.
For relayers that choose to opt-out, the Hydro Protocol
effective becomes a tokenless protocol.
nodes.name: exitIncentiveSystem

nodes.documentation: @return true if relayer is participating in the Hydro incentive system.
nodes.name: isParticipant

devdoc.title: LibRelayer provides two distinct features for relayers.  * First, Relayers can opt into or out of the Hydro liquidity incentive system. * Second, a relayer can register a delegate address. Delegates can send matching requests on behalf of relayers. The delegate scheme allows additional possibilities for smart contract interaction. on behalf of the relayer.

approveDelegate(address).notice: Approve an address to match orders on behalf of msg.sender

exitIncentiveSystem().notice: Exit the Hydro incentive system. For relayers that choose to opt-out, the Hydro Protocol effective becomes a tokenless protocol.
